title: Ultimate Dominion - MUD Day Demo
description:
This is a project demo as part of the MUD Day CLS: autonomous worlds, onchain games, and non-financial applications.

Ultimate Dominion is a fully onchain text-based RPG. Explore the world, defeat monsters, collect, buy, and sell items.
